reviews.review: just to jump right into it. the game is design to be unbalanced, its a 4 vs 1 asymmetrical game so the 1 killer needs to be more op than the 4 survivors. but when it comes down to it the killers always complain and the devs have to buff them. im a survivor main but sometimes play killer for the bp, and its just too easy i often feel sorry as the killer and let the last survivor get the hatch, how bad must these killers be that they continuously need these buffs even 2 out of two kills isnt bad, we watch dowsey exploit some survivor perks but hes a pro player not everyone can pull off these things, i feel like the killer is getting the buffs and the game is getting nerfed to the point that none of my friends play it anymore
Great game, always listening to the community to improve!

Dead by Daylight can be fun sometimes and very rewarding, but if you rage very easily it is not for you. The amount of people who camp or tunnel you is just countless, and when you have a game against a hacker there is no point. How many times do you die because of your teamates, 'ummmm i lost count' is the answer. It seems they cannot deal with these issues.

Ein wirklich sehr interessantes Spiel, durch dieses Spiel bin ich Rassist, Sexist und sehr stark Recht geworden. Und besonders habe ich gelernt das Schweden sehr abstrakte wesen sind.
10/10

after update on 19/07/22 the game is shit

its fun but it feels more like a 1 v 4 then a 4 v killer.  if you get what i mean there is also almost no punishment for being hit the first time even though in the movies the game is going on it would be your touched your dead  not only is being hit by the hunter only a little issue any non medicly trained survivor can heal it in like 4 seconds. as well as the killer is punished for any cheese strats the survivor can do what ever the feel like its not like the game is against the killers winning more against them having fun as a killer.

The game has Meg Thomas
10/10 would recommend

Das Spiel hat eine eigene Spannung die einen immer wieder aufs neue Ã¼berrascht. AuÃŸerdem ist fÃ¼r jeden was dabei Du kannst als Killer oder Survivor spielen, mit Freunden oder auch alleine. Dir steht die Welt offen in Dead by Daylight.
LOVE this game! Very easy to learn and new killers and survivors are always being released!

Lots of fun, incredible community. The killers are all really well done, even the ones I don't like I don't really complain about. Licensed killers are an incredible addition to the game. Really wish we could've gotten Jason as one before the Friday series got its own game.
There is a "meta" to the game but you could realistically play the game however you like. Try hard or casual and you would have an easy time getting into the lobbies that match your style. There is the off chance you get a group of survivors or a killer who is the opposite of your playstyle and thats something you have to look past. I wish there could be a way other than the ranking system to decide what type of players you go up against or with.
Takes lots of practice and you learn as you go but it's really fun, especially with friends!
I enjoy the game so far

i love this game

Really great with friends, but if you play trapper your mid as a person

if you get sick of the constant anxiety being a survivor provides; you can switch it over to killer mode to instantly convert it in to blind fury as survivors run you around the same loop for 2 minutes straight and t-bag you before leading you to another loop to repeat.


10/10 Asymmetrical horror game.

Most fantastic and well made game I have ever played. Incredibly balanced, easy to learn, accessible to new players, fun, and has a great community. I would definitely recommend to any and all people lookin to have a good old time <333

This game has a great community besides the Face campers and all the negative stuff, But otherwise great game and community. 10/10
Play this game if you enjoy the urge of throwing someone's grandmother out a 8th story window while listening to Russian music just to be mind merked from a spirit with 5 hours.
Its a fun game with friends, only thing i hate is nobody wants to play killer, making survivor que long af.

Let me just start by saying this game is one of the best survival/horror game I have seen. I love how this game has many survivors and killers to choose from and that list keeps growing, though it is painful that you have to buy most of the characters with real money but I got used to it but also they do you give you a good amount of characters to start out with and I also love how they get iconic characters and new original characters. I love how all the survivors and killers have their own perks. I love the mechanics in the game I also love how you can customize your survivor, killer, and hook. I'm going to end my review here thanks for reading my review on Dead By Daylight a wonderful your thinking of getting this game I highly recommend it and I can't wait to see what they add next in this game.
